text: tava da numba ge paramadhipati malak varun (deva dutayin) amata "sæbævin ma mama mahapolove niyojita (paramparavak) pat karanna ta yami" yæyi pævasu avasthava sihipat karanu. api oba va oba ge prasamsava tulin pivituru karamin, oba va suvisuddha karamin sitiya di oba ehi kalahakam karana, tava da rudhiraya halana pirisak pat karannehi dæyi ovuhu pævasuha. numbala nodanna dæ sæbævin ma mama danimi yæyi ohu pævasuveya
